item.title: Pot hole around manhole, 25th February
item.description:
Pothole formed around manhole so when vehicles go over it, it makes the most awful loud noise and we can hear this in our flats. Can the council do something about this as its so loud. Thank you

item.title: Drain and gulleys need cleaning, 25th February
item.description:
Drain outside number 12 still blocked with leaves and rubbish. The Colney Hatch Lane end of the street needs regular cleaning due to litter dropped by people going to the shops and litter dumped out of parked cars.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Wilton Road, Colney Hatch, Greater London

item.title: Paving infront of 29 bournewood road work carried out but the pavement is uneven and dangerous with gaps and the work has destroyed the top of my drop kurb and has not resolved the original issue of water collecting and running onto my drive way leaving puddles which has caused my drive to collapse, 25th February
item.description:
Paving infront of 29 bournewood road work carried out but the pavement is uneven and dangerous with gaps and the work has destroyed the top of my drop kurb and has not resolved the original issue of water collecting and running onto my drive way leaving puddles which has caused my drive to collapse the paving is all pitching towards my drive including the tarmac around the tree after rain I have to sweep all the water away and God knows how I am meant to fix my drive now the dip just continues to get worse as the water flows onto my drive and washes away the underlayer

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bournewood Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Restaurant A Frame signs blocking the public footpath, 25th February
item.description:
Pedestrians need to walk on the road - particularly inconvenient and inconsiderate for disabled people. These A Frame restaurant signs should not prevent pedestrians from using and crossing intersections as a public thoroughfare. Please remind the restaurants if their legal obligation and monitor their behaviour. This has been a problem and daily repeated offence for months and is unacceptable. I pay my taxes for use of the pavers a method of safely walking ALONGSIDE the road, not ON THE ROAD where I am in danger of being hit by a car or cyclist.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Joan Street, Southwark, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 10cm deep 60cm wide pothole near drainage grate, 25th February
item.description:

item.title: Household rubbish dumped on non collection days, 25th February
item.description:
Someone is dumping onto the street their bags of household rubbish on non collection days. The current - growing - heap was left out on Monday pm (collection days Monday and Thursday am). The photo shows a name and address so please would you contact them and ask them to stop this anti social and unhealthy (kitchen waste) behaviour? Thank you!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Anderson Street, Chelsea, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped oveernight on pavement, 25th February
item.description:
